Subjects meet inclusion criterion none exclusion criterion enter one day treatment period . During period , 4 anal manometric study take place . DOC.brief_title: Study Examine Effect Coated Phenylephrine Suppositories Anal Pressure Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: This open label , dose-finding study . Approximately 8 healthy subject participate study . A screening use determine subject suitability inclusion trial . Within one week screen visit , subject meet inclusion criterion none exclusion criterion enter one day treatment period . During period , 4 anal manometric study take place . Study medication ( Coated Phenylephrine suppositories various dos ) administer pre-determined interval . During study , blood sample obtain plasma Phenylephrine analysis.After determine baseline rest anal pressure manometric test , coat Suppositories administer intra rectally . Subjects take rectally total 1 Coated Suppository per study . 60 , 120 240 minute coat suppository insertion amnometric study perform : The first 2 subject study receive 40 mg phenyephrine coat suppository . If significant ( > 15 % ) increase rest anal pressure occur dose , rest study subject receive dose . If raise rest anal pressure significant AND adverse event observe , follow subject receive 80 mg phenylehprine coat suppository .
DOC.criteria: Signed write informed consent . Male female subject 18 55 year age . Active chronic disease . In need chronic use medication , exception birth control medication . Currently use medication acute illness . Has use , last four week , drug may affect blood coagulation , Aspirin , Warfarin , Sintrom , Enoxaparin , Nadroparin , Heparin , Clopidogrel , Ticlopidine . Has upon physical examination rectal deformation sign rectal disease fissure , bleed hemorrhoid , fistula. , infection space occupy lesion . Receipt investigational treatment ( drug device ) within 90 day prior screen .
